column4: there is one a little annoying thing that I can't find the settings for it since I am here for a quick stop I may s well as for it: when I have multiple windows open the windows behind the main windows becomes transparent a little, how can I remove that transparency /opacity ??
<mDemocritus> yes
<mDemocritus> compiz
<mDemocritus> I think I looked there but since I am a blind man chances are I missed
go to system->preferences->advanced desktop eff sett
first transparency bellow general settings (second group), disable it
did you found it? just disable first transparency option bellow general section *general is the very first section*
group Accessibility, disable Opacity
opacify, sry
give me a moment to look at it
perhaps i got wrong what is bothering you, tell me again your problem plz
perhaps i got wrong what is bothering you, tell me again your problem plz
so, only the top window is not transparent?
press super+P ... if this is not your solution, press it again to go back
well, i get this soon as i enable Opacify ... if it is disabled, we must search through all opacity settings
what settings do you have in General Options *double click on it to see it*
did you look at Opacity settings? anything that points to your problem?
you didn't told me what happens if you press super+P (or you did and i forgot it? :P)
under section effects, TrailFocus ... there is a solution to your problem. change values to your need or disable Trail Focus
np, main thing you solve it. i'm glad i could help
thanks again
